last_episode_to_air.name: Avenged
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Jeffrey Epstein deceased, the survivors continue to seek justice and finally see a glimmer of hope with the shocking arrest of alleged co-conspirator Ghislaine Maxwell.

name: Surviving Jeffrey Epstein
overview: This docuseries investigates billionaire New York financier Jeffrey Epstein, who is alleged to have used his connections to the rich and famous to shield his predatory behavior with young girls. Revealing how Epstein set up a pseudo sexual Ponzi scheme to bring in underaged girls, the doc delves into the aftermath the survivors are experiencing with no justice to be served.

episodes.name: Lured
episodes.overview: Several survivors detail the story of Jeffrey Epstein, the mysterious billionaire on Palm Beach Island, Florida, who lured them, as young teenagers, to his home through an elaborate series of female recruiters they thought they could trust.

episodes.name: Trapped
episodes.overview: More survivors untangle the complex and insidious sex trafficking scheme that ensnared them as trusting young women pursuing their dreams, including never before told stories.

episodes.name: No Way Out
episodes.overview: Over the course of three decades, Epstein's sex trafficking operation becomes a well-oiled machine; survivors reveal their experiences that took place on Epstein's private island.

episodes.name: Avenged
episodes.overview: With Jeffrey Epstein deceased, the survivors continue to seek justice and finally see a glimmer of hope with the shocking arrest of alleged co-conspirator Ghislaine Maxwell.
